nodes.text: Treffelt Wuin was a male Human who served the Galactic Empire as a mid-level bureaucrat assigned to the Bissillirus Resupply Base. Passed over for promotion, Wuin started to supply information on the base to the Alliance to Restore the Republic through the merchant Hennilrum. Wuin came into possession of vital information regarding the base and a supply convoy, and demanded an extraction from the base and relocation to an Alliance safe world in return for the information. An Alliance team infiltrated the under-construction station posing as the security detachment of Ensil Moiss and effected his extraction.
